Posts.Content: Nena75 wrote: I found a lump on my right breast and have a scheduled ultrasound and mammogram on Wednesday. I can't stop thinking of all the negative scenarios that could happen. I am 42 and have two boys, ages 14 and 13. I don't want to tell any one to not worry them, but in the mean time I feel like I want to scream. I worry about my husband, who works out off town and my boys. I try to remain optomistic, but I am really scaref. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Found a lump and scared out of my mind Nena75 marie5890

Posts.Content: Jun 7, 2016 04:30PM Nena75 wrote: Thank you for your words of encouragement. I hope the best for you on Thursday. I worry so much about my boys and my husband. I try to remain positive and busy as to not think too much. I haven't told anyone except for my husband, as to not worry them. I wish you the best and stay positive.
Posts.Title: Found a lump and scared out of my mind Nena75 marie5890
